flowRoot.flowPara: We assume cockpit is installed by default
5. Tells you the IP+port to open in web browser
Shows dialog with list of machines discovered over SLP and a address bar
if any server has the cockpit slp flag, don't show it here
Asks for username and password for Server B
Asks if it's ok that Server B is untrusted
If Server B don't have Cockpit-openslp-tag
Server B appears on Dashboard of Server A
Server A appears on dashboard of Server B
Is Server A part of a domain?
Sync admin accounts from Server A over to Server B
